description: Join us for the Wood Green Creative Spaces and Places Tour, a journey through the workspaces of the creative industries of Wood Green. This tour offers a unique opportunity to visit a few of Wood Green’s workspaces showcasing a range of studios such as those for ceramics, music, visual arts, and design.

factsheet.heading: Wood Green Creative Spaces and Places Tour
paragraphs: Join us for the Wood Green Creative Spaces and Places Tour, a journey through the workspaces of the creative industries of Wood Green. This tour offers a unique opportunity to visit a few of Wood Green’s workspaces showcasing a range of studios such as those for ceramics, music, visual arts, and design.

As we walk through the neighbourhood, you will get an insider's look at the community of artists creatives and entrepreneurs who operate in Wood Green, learn about their projects and gain insights into the innovative practices that contribute to the area’s cultural richness.

Whether you are a local resident, a workspace enthusiast, or simply curious about the creative industries in Wood Green, please join us and experience first-hand how creativity and community come together in this hidden corner of London.
We will meet outside the entrance to River Park House opposite Wood Green underground station and finish near Coburg Road in Wood Green.

location.address: Outside the entrance to River Park House opposite Wood Green undergro
travel_info: Additional travel info: We will meet outside the entrance to River Park House opposite Wood Green underground station and finish near Coburg Road in Wood Green.

name: Wood Green Creative Spaces and Places Tour
